cb_radio_regulations.general_description: Citizens' band radio (CB radio) is used for all types of private, non-commercial radio communication within the 27 MHz band. It is intended for the exchange of personal information and views.

illegal.description: CB radio activities that are completely prohibited

items.description: Using CB radio for commercial or business purposes
items.reason: CB radio is designated for private, non-commercial use only

items.description: CB radios that do not meet Swiss interface requirements
items.reason: Must comply with Swiss technical standards

items.description: Using Packet Radio devices on CB frequencies without proper call sign registration
items.reason: Data transmission requires OFCOM call sign registration

permit_or_registration.description: CB radio activities requiring permits, registration, or specific conditions

items.description: Used or new CB radios destined to remain in Switzerland
items.conditions: Must be declared and assessed for clearance at customs

items.description: Packet Radio devices on CB frequencies
items.conditions: Registration required with Federal Office of Communications (OFCOM) since January 1, 2013

items.description: CB radios must meet Swiss interface requirements
items.conditions: Only compliant devices may be used in Switzerland

legal.description: CB radio activities allowed with standard conditions

items.description: CB radiotelephones operating in 27 MHz band meeting Swiss requirements
items.conditions: No radiocommunications licence required since January 1, 2013

items.description: Used CB radios imported by persons resident abroad for re-exportation
Private, non-commercial radio communication for personal information and views

important_notes.frequency_band: 27 MHz band designated for CB radio use
important_notes.license_change: No radiocommunications licence required since January 1, 2013 for radiotelephony
important_notes.data_transmission_requirement: Call sign registration with OFCOM required for Packet Radio devices since January 1, 2013
important_notes.customs_rule: Declaration and assessment required for CB radios remaining in Switzerland
important_notes.tax_exemption: Tax-free import available for temporary import by non-residents for re-export
